briefdescription.para: Allows to specify individual bookmarks outline level.

detaileddescription.para: If bookmark level is not specified in this collection then DefaultBookmarksOutlineLevel value is used.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets a value determining whether or not to create missing outline levels when the document is exported. Default value for this property is false.
Specifies whether or not to create outlines for headings (paragraphs formatted with the Heading styles) inside tables.
Specifies the default level in the document outline at which to display Word bookmarks.

detaileddescription.para: Individual bookmarks level could be specified using BookmarksOutlineLevels property.
Specify 0 and Word bookmarks will not be displayed in the document outline. Specify 1 and Word bookmarks will be displayed in the document outline at level 1; 2 for level 2 and so on.
Default is 0. Valid range is 0 to 9.

briefdescription.para: Specifies how many levels in the document outline to show expanded when the file is viewed.

detaileddescription.para: Note that this options will not work when saving to XPS.
Specify 0 and the document outline will be collapsed; specify 1 and the first level items in the outline will be expanded and so on.
Default is 0. Valid range is 0 to 9.

briefdescription.para: Specifies how many levels of headings (paragraphs formatted with the Heading styles) to include in the document outline.

detaileddescription.para: Specify 0 for no headings in the outline; specify 1 for one level of headings in the outline and so on.
Default is 0. Valid range is 0 to 9.
